description: The award remembers the efforts of Betty Thornley who risked her life to save others in Jersey.
title: MBE for Jersey nurse who defied Nazis sold at auction
title_page: MBE for Jersey nurse who defied Nazis sold at auction - BBC News
maintext: "She was so kind. She even sent food parcels back to Burton to help my mum as I was one of four children," she said.
